    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Entrypoint of the project, specification whether a streaming client or receiving client should be started

      • streamClient

        public void streamClient(java.lang.String mediaUrl)
        Stream Client, sets up the stream and has the option to change the used symmetric cryptographic algorithm and the parties who are allowed to watch the stream.
        Parameters:
        mediaUrl - the url that should be streamed

      • receiveClient

        public void receiveClient()
        The receiving client. Receives and plays the stream if he added on the list of allowed clients in the streaming client.

      • displayVideo

        public void displayVideo(java.lang.String location)
        Starts the video capture and the multicast server. Will encrypt data according to the specified algorithm in the streaming client Will also show the captured stream to the streaming client
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the video

      • validIP

        public static boolean validIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Method used to determine whether a string can be used as an IP-address
        Parameters:
        ip - The string representation of a possible IP-address
        Returns:
        True is the presented string can be used as an IP-address, false otherwise

      • testCrypto

        public void testCrypto()
        Method that will encrypt and decrypt messages, used for performance measurements and sanity checks
